trans-unit.source: Represents image data returned by a decoder and accepted by encoders.
trans-unit.target: Representa os dados de imagem retornados por um decodificador e aceitos pelo codificadores.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> provides additional functionality not defined by <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> by providing access to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Thumbnail%2A> associated with a particular frame of an image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> fornece funcionalidade adicional não definida pelos <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> fornecendo acesso ao <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Thumbnail%2A> associado a um quadro específico de uma imagem.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> also supports the writing of metadata information by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> também oferece suporte a gravação de informações de metadados usando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> propriedade ou o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> returned from a decoder is always frozen.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> retornado de um decodificador sempre está congelado.

trans-unit.source: If you require a modifiable copy, you must first create a copy of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Clone%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisar de uma cópia modificável, você deve primeiro criar uma cópia do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> usando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Clone%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Only [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] format images support multiple frames.
trans-unit.target: Somente [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] suportem a quadros de várias imagens em formato.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> usando um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> object to open a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] graphic and write metadata by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> objeto para abrir um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] gráfico e gravar metadados usando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that represents the base <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the current context.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém ou define um valor que representa o <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> base do contexto atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the current context.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> do contexto atual.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> objects that are associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém uma coleção de objetos de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> que são associados a esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> objects that are associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção somente leitura de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> objetos que estão associados com esta <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> based on the supplied arguments.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> com base nos argumentos fornecidos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that is used to construct the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> usado para construir o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> de um determinado <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> de um determinado <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: The `bitmapStream` can be closed after the frame is created only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> cache option is used.
trans-unit.target: O `bitmapStream` poderá ser fechada depois que o quadro é criado somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> opção de cache é usada.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> cache option retains the stream until the frame is needed.
trans-unit.target: O padrão <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> opção de cache mantém o fluxo até que o quadro é necessária.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%29> method to specify create and cache options.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%29> método para especificar a criar e opções de cache.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that identifies the source of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> que identifica a origem do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> de um determinado <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> de um determinado <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to construct a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> from a given <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como construir um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> de um determinado <xref:System.Uri>.

trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> de um determinado <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.

trans-unit.target: Os requisitos de cache para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> de um determinado <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> com <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> de um determinado <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> com o <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy%29> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy%29> é introduzido no .NET Framework versão 3.5.

trans-unit.target: A origem da qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> é construído.

trans-unit.source: A thumbnail image of the resulting <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma imagem em miniatura do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> resultante.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> with the specified thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> de um determinado <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> com a miniatura especificada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> with the specified thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> de um determinado <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> com a miniatura especificada.

trans-unit.source: The stream from which this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> is constructed.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo do qual este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> é construído.

trans-unit.source: The options that are used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: As opções usadas para criar este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The cache option that is used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: As opção de cache usada para criar este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> de um determinado <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> com o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> de um determinado <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> com o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> cache option if you wish to close the `bitmapStream` after the bitmap is created.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> opção de cache, se você deseja fechar o `bitmapStream` depois que o bitmap é criado.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: O padrão <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> opção de cache mantém o acesso ao fluxo de até que o bitmap é necessária e a limpeza é tratada pelo coletor de lixo.

trans-unit.source: The location of the bitmap from which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> is created.
trans-unit.target: O local do bitmap do qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> é criado.

trans-unit.source: The options that are used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: As opções usadas para criar este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The cache option that is used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: As opção de cache usada para criar este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> de um determinado <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> com os <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> de um determinado <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> com o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> especificado e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />.

trans-unit.target: As opção de cache usada para criar este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.target: Os requisitos de cache para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />, and <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> de um determinado <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> com os <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> e <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />, and <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> de um determinado <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> com os <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> e <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%2CSystem.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy%29> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that is used to construct this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> usado para construir este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: A thumbnail image of the resulting <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma imagem em miniatura do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> resultante.

trans-unit.source: The metadata to associate with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Os metadados a serem associados a esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> objects that are associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> que estão associados a esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> with the specified thumbnail, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" />, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> de um determinado <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> com a miniatura especificada, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> with the specified thumbnail, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" />, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> de um determinado <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> com a miniatura especificada, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter" />, which can be used to associate metadata with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, cria uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter" />, que pode ser usada para associar metadados a um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter" />.

trans-unit.source: Metadata can only be added or edited using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> if the image file contains enough room for the new metadata; otherwise, metadata can be added using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Metadados só podem ser adicionados ou editados com o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> se o arquivo de imagem contém espaço suficiente para os novos metadados; caso contrário, metadados podem ser adicionados usando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> object to open a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] graphic and write metadata by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> objeto para abrir um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] gráfico e gravar metadados usando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the decoder associated with this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém o decodificador associado a essa instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the thumbnail image associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém a imagem de miniatura associada a esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that represents a thumbnail of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> que representa uma miniatura do atual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
